lexie.name: Lexie Mayer
lexie.desc: She is the station Nurse. She is kind, always wanting to help others. Always is saying sarcastic jokes to lighten the mood of others.

sarah.name: Sarah Forrest
sarah.desc: Jealous, condescending, inconsiderate towards others. Is always being fake towards everyone. Very selfish and believes she is the most important/intelligent one in the team. Is one of the Engineers present on the ship.

tyan.name: Tyan Criploens
tyan.desc: Incredible smart computer scientist, knows how to work around software. He is your best friend, you went into the same degree and stuck beside you throughout the whole degree.
